column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Start an Accessory Business
#Text=If you are interested in selling accessories ( jewellery , bags , hats etc. ) then follow these few steps that should get you up and running .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Think of a name .
#Text=When thinking of a brand name , it 's usually best to get a notepad ready for a list that will help you remember all the name and make the process of elimination easier .
#Text=Try to think of something that emphasises your persona or brand message .
#Text=Practice makes perfect
#Text=Go on the Internet to try to find some accessory-making courses/classes .
#Text=This will help make your brand more original , creative and will also make your days a bit easier .
#Text=Choose your brand 's theme .
#Text=Consider how you want to represent yourself and your brand .
#Text=If you 're a happy person , opt for light colours and fun designs .
#Text=If you 're a serious , practical person , design the whole brand to how it suits you !
#Text=This is one of the most important parts .
#Text=Get inspired .
#Text=Before you actually start making anything or finalising your brand , go to craft fairs and look at some of the homemade jewelry they have created .
#Text=Take a note down of the properties and design features of the ones that you like so you can mix them up and add to yours when you do start making !
#Text=Have patience .
#Text=Make the jewelry !
#Text=If you could n't find much inspiration , go on YouTube and see how they make the jewelry in different ways to give effect .
#Text=Tell and show people .
#Text=After making all your fabulous pieces , it 's time to spread the word and put on a jewelry party !
#Text=Get a few friends to come round , have a few drinks , mingle but most importantly , ask for feedback and try to sell the bracelets !
#Text=Obviously , you should n't have high prices as they are not part of a big brand yet , but hopefully soon will be !
#Text=Advertise your products .
#Text=Put flyers up around town and posting business cards on bulletin boards really help improve business .
#Text=Also , setting up your own website is another really helpful way to get people to buy your jewelry and try to get ' founded ' by shops and big accessory brands .
#Text=Meet the managers .
#Text=iI the jewelry is selling , it 's time to talk to some high street store managers that could maybe give you a brand funded by that shop .
#Text=Making an appointment with a lower end fashion store is a good way to start .
#Text=Keep on trying until you finally get accepted .
#Text=Help out .
#Text=As you went to craft fairs earlier on , do the same and sell some of your accessories there , maybe to help someone in the same position as you were !
#Text=Make multiple of the same design just in case some are more popular than others .
#Text=Have a grand opening .
#Text=if you think you have enough money , and the accessories will do well enough , maybe it 's time to open up your own shop !
#Text=Look around town and the high street to see if there are any places to let , or set up your own stall in the middle of a shopping centre .
#Text=You could maybe think about getting a ground floor apartment close to where you live and use that as the shop , with the landlord 's permission .
#Text=Get some staff and your own shop !
#Text=As the job market is rapidly getting lower , you could help a non-working friend out by giving them a job .
#Text=Even though you have your own business , it never hurts to carry the store on and try to set up a brand in another shop .
#Text=Choose an employee of the month .
#Text=Never give up .
#Text=If the business is n't going so well , ask your friends to recommend you and advertise more on the radio or tv .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Ask a lot of stores if they would n't mind using your designs for their store .
#Text=Do n't just use only one and keep persisting .
#Text=Only open a store if your positive the accessories are doing well .
#Text=Otherwise stick to the Internet or open a stall .
#Text=If you have a 3+ story house , why not consider using the ground floor as your store ?
#Text=It 's cheaper and it wo n't be that far to travel to .
#Text=At the jewelry parties , ask your friends to bring a few of their friends for more recommendations .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=You may experience debt if you are not sure about the business levels and profits .
